statements: DELETE FROM buildings WHERE building_id = 10 AND building_name = 'Office Building';
DELETE FROM EnergyConsumption WHERE building_id = 2 AND timestamp < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM CarbonFootprint WHERE building_id = 3 AND year = 2022;
DELETE FROM CarbonFootprint WHERE building_id = 1 AND month = 6 AND year = 2022;
DELETE FROM EnergyConsumption WHERE building_id = 2 AND consumption_date = '2022-09-15';
DELETE FROM reports WHERE building_id = 2001 AND report_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM reports WHERE building_id = 1 AND efficiency_rating < 0.5
